anyOf.description: This represents a link to a generator for a biome

generator.description:
generator
The generator id
   
Iris Generator

    
* Default Value is default
Must be a valid generators (use ctrl+space for auto complete!)

min.description:
min
The min block value (value + fluidHeight)
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 0
* Minimum allowed is -2032
* Maximum allowed is 2032

max.description:
max
The max block value (value + fluidHeight)
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 0
* Minimum allowed is -2032
* Maximum allowed is 2032
